file_path.description: File path to the XML or HTML file to read.

xpath.description: XML path to evaluate against read file content

source_type.description: Source type of the input, it can be XML or HTML

return_list.description: Always return a list of results. Default to false.

to_file.description: Whether the event should be saved in a file or sent directly

description: Read the XML file and return its content evaluated against specified xpath
name: Read XML File

output_path.description: Path to the file with the content
